mdRecord.dcterms:title: Document, List of suits, 1797 May 6
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dated at the top, the list of 11 suits includes: "1 Full Suit of Regimentals;" ditto half; and suits of Spanish cloth; olive colour; dark brown; lighter brown; half mourning; raven grey; black; then under the heading "Velvet - Silk - and Cassimer" 1 full Suit -- Velvet, 1 Uncut. Autograph document signed, fragment, silked, watermark (George Washington's incomplete).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Clothing and dress
